entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 07 at 3:24PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STORM FORCE LOW LIKELY SATURDAY... A strong, developing storm force low moving up from the south will bring strong winds, high seas, and heavy rain for the southern panhandle and outer coast.
